summary: Normally the racial powers you have from picking your race are restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of cooldown.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	     LFox No Racial Power Cooldown v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the racial powers.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Normally the racial powers you have from picking your race are
restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the
powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of
cooldown.

NOTE: Once again I might have used a cooldown for the powers but
I still don\'t know how to do that.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin

*****************************************************************

     5. Contact Info

*****************************************************************

Direct all questions/comments to
hornedreapermjl@hotmail.com
author: LFox
